Articles.Content: I was wondering, how do you post pictures without imgur?

Use the ![%7Boption%7D](%7Boption%7D) tag and a direct URL for the image.

[This page](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode) has a full list of the BBCode tags for the forum.
Is there a way to do this from a file on my computer?
No, you'll need to upload it to an online image host.
